We create an individual plan for your trip to Kiev

That’s what you get

All places in logical orders

We care that you will see all the places in the most suitable daytime. Some places are worth visiting in the morning and some looks outstanding in the evening.

All events in Kiev during your stay in your map

Every week a year we have dozens of events: concerts, festivals, exhibitions. We will give you complete information about all of them during your stay.

We will make a plan based on your interest

Whether you come alone, with kids or for Bachelor Party we will care that you will find what you are looking for.

Explore the city by yourself without boring tours

Be independent and flexible to discover attractions at your own pace. We will just care that you feel confident in our city.

You don’t need to waste time for planning

We have already spent hundreds of hours discovering the most interesting places and know which you should see and when.

Support 24 hours-a-day / 7 days-a-week

Ask any question at any time in WhatsApp, Facebook Messanger or Viber and get help during your visit to Kiev.

Step 4/4

Request a Route

Classic Route

Excellent option to explore all the major attractions of the city. Along with the route of the tour will get to know the history of Ukraine, starting from the foundation of Kiev and finishing with independent Ukraine.

25 euro

Cafe and Bars

This is a plan for those who in love with a really awesome cocktails and delicious cuisine. You’ll try Ukrainian dishes and will see the nightlife of Kyiv.

25 euro

Non tourist

If you want to visit non-tourist places, dive into the Ukrainian culture and explore the deep corners of the city, be sure to take this map. We know the most interesting and unusual places!

25 euro
